org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.token.handlers.grant

Class AbstractValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.oltu.oauth2.common.validators.AbstractValidator
      • org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.token.handlers.grant.AbstractValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.oltu.oauth2.common.validators.OAuthValidator

    public abstract class AbstractValidator
extends org.apache.oltu.oauth2.common.validators.AbstractValidator
    AbstractValidator class is extended from Apache Oltu's org.apache.oltu.oauth2.common.validators.AbstractValidator AbstractValidator class and provide number of additional helper methods for custom grant type Validators.
    Since:
    5.4.10
